check.name: IllegalIdentifierName
check.description: Checks identifiers against a regular expression pattern to detect illegal names. Since this check uses a pattern to define valid identifiers, users will need to use negative lookaheads to explicitly ban certain names (e.g., "var") or patterns (e.g., any identifier containing $) while still allowing all other valid identifiers.

property.name: format
property.description: Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers.
